screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pef file in Microsoft Photos 2020
screenshot.caption: PEF file open in Microsoft Photos 2020

description: PEF files are saved in the Pentax Electronic format utilized by various Pentax camera models. Pentax cameras may store images in slightly different variations of the format. For example, images saved in the Pentax Electronic format may also be saved with a .PTX file extension.
The PEF format is one of many raw image formats utilized by various camera manufacturers. Other raw file types include:
